abstract: Peter Prevc wins Four Hills Tour ski-jumping event in Innsbruck, Austria; other winter sports news noted.
snippet: The ski jumper Peter Prevc won in dominating fashion in Innsbruck, Austria, on the third stop of the Four Hills Tour, positioning himself to become the annual event’s first Slovene winner in nearly two decades.
lead_paragraph: The ski jumper Peter Prevc won in dominating fashion in Innsbruck, Austria, on the third stop of the Four Hills Tour, positioning himself to become the annual event’s first Slovene winner in nearly two decades.
